sourcesContent:
import '../styles/ProjectCard.css'; export default function ProjectCard({ darkMode }) { const projects = [ { image: "/FILMFANATIC.png", title: "Film Fanatic", description: "Movie browser built with TMDB API. Search, explore and get real-time movie info in a sleek responsive UI.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=react,js,html,css", liveLink: "https://film-fanatic-eta.vercel.app", codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/FilmFanatic" }, { image: "/logo192.png", title: "Analizador Léxico", description: "Educational React app for tokenizing and parsing lexical input from users using basic automata theory.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=react,js,html,css", liveLink: "https://analizador-lexico-web.vercel.app/", codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/analizador-lexico-web" }, { image: "/logo1.png", title: "Metaheurísticas Python", description: "Repositorio con algoritmos como Recocido Simulado y Búsqueda Local, aplicados a problemas de optimización en Python.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=python,jupyter", liveLink: null, codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/Metaheurisitcas_With_Python" }, { image: "/GUI.png", title: "Evaluador de Expresiones GUI", description: "Aplicación Java GUI que interpreta y evalúa expresiones infijas, útil para visualización de procesos matemáticos.", techIcons: "https://skillicons.dev/icons?i=java", liveLink: null, codeLink: "https://github.com/poncho-ajmv/EvaluadorExpresionesGUI" } ]; return (
{projects.map((project, index) => (

{project.title}

{project.description}

Code {project.liveLink && ( Live )}
))}
); }
